metadata.name: Mad N.I.C.E. Invaders
metadata.description: Mad N.I.C.E. Invaders is a collection that combines art with the massive utility in the N.I.C.E. Invaders Gamefi world and overall Invaderverse. We are introducing a new concept called Crushed NFTs which utilize your Mad N.I.C.E. Invaders collection piece as a key to your in game character cross-chain. See more at Invaderverse.com
